CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends     software-properties-common     devscripts     gpg-agent     fakeroot     dput  && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: sed -ri 's@# (deb-src http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ )([^[:space:]-]+)( main restricted)@\1\2\3\n\1\2-updates\3\n\1\2-proposed\3@' /etc/apt/sources.list  && apt-get update  && apt-get build-dep -y firefox  && apt-get source firefox  && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* # redo12
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd firefox-*  && cp ../xmonad-fullscreen.patch debian/patches  && echo "xmonad-fullscreen.patch" >> debian/patches/series  && dch -l ppa -D "$(lsb_release -c -s)" "Add xmonad fullscreen fix"  && echo "ac_add_options --disable-pulseaudio\nac_add_options --enable-alsa" >> debian/config/mozconfig.in  && dch -a "Disable pulseaudio and enable alsa"
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: gpg --import <<<"$0" && cd firefox-* && debuild -S && cd .. && LANG=C.UTF-8 dput ppa:willat8/ubuntu-desktop *.changes
Commands.Name: entrypoint
